A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I had high expectations\,  and no BS\, I wanted to walk out half way through this mess and I was longing for the end credits by the end of it.  What a mess! We waited 34 years to see the return of Luke in all of his badassdom\, instead we got Luke the loser.  Childish and purile jokes at the wrong moments\, and a weak as water plot. The prequels destroyed the legacy of Darth Vader. They are now out to destroy what was left of Star Wars. Sadly\, this film fails miserably.
